developerDetails.paragraphText:
I'm / I wish I could be (delete as appropriate) a front-end developer.

I really like this. It's annoying and relaxing in the same moment, since when you do it (finally) in a right manner - it works (that certainty is not so common elsewhere).


* And yes... I also do this for money.

designerDetails.paragraphText:
That's what I've been doing for living for past few years. A graphic designer for almost every dimension, but 3rd dimension suits me most.

However "most" doesn't mean entirely, I have knowledge of majority* of graphic programs that are widely used.


* Even Midjourney, that makes me redundant in some areas ('winter is coming ...')
